name: Acrobatics
description: The character’s ability to balance, jump elegantly or make acrobatic maneuvers.

name: Athletics
description: Physical fitness for sprinting, jumping, throwing and similar disciplines.

name: Command
description: The ability to inspire, interrogate, intimidate others or to simply come up with a tactical plan.

name: Computers
description: Hacking or repairing computers, as well as using them efficiently is governed by this skill.

name: Con Arts
description: Con describes a character’s ability to navigate complex social situations to convince, lie or negotiate.

name: Defense
description: This describes the characters ability to defend themselves from harm, by dodging, parrying or blocking.

name: Empathy
description: An empathetic character can put themselves into the shoe’s of others to understand their emotions and desires, or to assess their motives.

name: Firearms
description: A firearms expert knows how to modify or repair a gun, and how to use it with great accuracy.

name: Gunnery
description: A gunner operates the stationary weapons that are mounted on fortresses, vehicles or even star ships.

name: Heavy Weapons
description: This skill governs the use of heavy weapons like flame throwers, grenade launchers or other stationary guns.

name: Infiltration
description: The ability to remain hidden or to infiltrate others without knowing about your presence. The skill also governs the ability to impersonate others or to masquerade.

name: Investigation
description: Through investigation, a character can put together clues or notice things that are out of place.

name: Medicine
description: Doctors are crucial to find the right treatment for any kind of wound, illness or poison. They can also help install cybernetic modifications.

name: Melee
description: With this skill, a character an artfully use their fists or any type of melee weapon, from brass knuckles to a baseball bat.

name: Pilot
description: The skill covers a wide range of vehicles, from simple motor bikes to large space vessels. The skill only covers their general usage, esp. maneuvering.

name: Politics
description: With this skill a character may know important figures, but also how to negotiate political intricate situations or how to behave to belong to upper classes.

name: Science
description: A scientifically inclined character has a great understanding of math, chemistry, physics and similar fields. They may be able to device a blueprint to modify a given piece of equipment.

name: Sensors
description: Thanks to this skill, a character can use and read the sensory data from various devices, including drones.

name: Skullduggery
description: The skill covers means to trick someone with a distraction, pickpocketing or other means of theft.

name: Streetwise
description: With this skill, a character may know their way around a city, where to find certain contacts or even black markets.

name: Survival
description: A survivalist is able to make their way through a harsh environment, set up camps, forage for food or just generally survive inhospitable conditions, like resisting illness or venoms.

name: Tech
description: An engineer can create, modify or repair pieces of equipment, or assess their general state.

name: Xenology
description: A xeno scientist knows about the demeanor of various alien species, the nuances of their language and politics.

name: Zero-G
description: Through this skill, a character can navigate zero-g environments with ease, as well as donning a zero-g suit quickly and safely.
